title: Recovering my account
body:
Over the past weekend I was not able to login to my account for unknown reasons. I changed my password as of Sunday and was able to login. I'm now trying to login again and have come across the same issue. The password I'm entering is correct and when I am attempting to get the password reset link sent to me it is not coming through (this just worked Sunday mind you). Also attempted to have my username sent to me and no luck getting an email still. I created a help ticket with riot and the only way I can access it is through logging in with my account info which is not registering in the system seeing as I've had the same account information for almost 4 years now. Ticket #30380423.


I have a smurf account that allows me to login just fine and has no problems. Nobody has been playing on my account so i don't think it has been stolen. I would just like to know where this ticket stands and also an explanation as to how this happened 2 days in a row when I've never had a problem before.

replies.body:
This issue might be caused by something else entirely, and not credentials.  We currently have a post [stickied ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)up top, but players on the wrong version of the patch can come up with an incorrect login error.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a Force Repatch to make sure you're on the most current version.  The manual steps might help as well.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.  In the meantime, having a ticket up was a solid plan!

I have the same issue. I was going to play league the other day with some friends and when I tried to log in it said my name/password was incorrect. I tried recovering my account and nothing was sent to my email address. it is the only email address I have used on this game! so it should work! my name that I play on is "--snip--" and my account name is --snip--. cant log in, and cant figure out password. when i sent in a ticket for riot to help me, it wont even let me reply back. so...
Dude, you got to be careful about sharing your account information like that.  It's an easier access for someone to compromise your account, so you want to keep that stuff close and safe.
i'm having the same problem i don't know why its happening. it also took me out in the middle of a game.
